com.mendeley.api

Interface MendeleySdk


  • public interface MendeleySdk
    Main entry points for making calls to the Mendeley SDK.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • signIn

        void signIn(Activity activity,
          MendeleySignInInterface signInCallback,
          ClientCredentials clientCredentials)
        Sign the user in.
        Parameters:
        activity - used for creating the sign-in activity.
        clientCredentials - your app's Mendeley ID/secret/Uri, from the registration process.
        signInCallback - used to receive sign in/out events. May be null.

      • isSignedIn

        boolean isSignedIn()
        Determine if the user is signed in.

        If the user has successfully signed in at any point in the past, they will remain signed in, even if the application is stopped and removed from memory, because the credentials are stored persistently.

      • signOut

        void signOut()
        Sign out from the user's account.

        All stored credentials are erased.

      • getDocuments

        RequestHandle getDocuments(DocumentRequestParameters parameters,
                         GetDocumentsCallback callback)
        Retrieve a list of documents in the user's library.

      • getDocuments

        RequestHandle getDocuments(GetDocumentsCallback callback)
        Retrieve a list of documents in the user's library.

      • getDocuments

        RequestHandle getDocuments(Page next,
                         GetDocumentsCallback callback)
        Retrieve subsequent pages of documents in the user's library.

      • getDocument

        void getDocument(java.lang.String documentId,
               View view,
               GetDocumentCallback callback)
        Retrieve a single document, specified by ID.
        Parameters:
        documentId - the document id to get.
        view - extended document view. If null, only core fields are returned.

      • getDeletedDocuments

        RequestHandle getDeletedDocuments(java.lang.String deletedSince,
                                DocumentRequestParameters parameters,
                                GetDeletedDocumentsCallback callback)
        Retrieve a list of deleted documents in the user's library.
        Parameters:
        deletedSince - only return documents deleted since this timestamp. Should be supplied in ISO 8601 format.
        parameters - holds optional query parameters, will be ignored if null

      • getDeletedDocuments

        RequestHandle getDeletedDocuments(Page next,
                                GetDeletedDocumentsCallback callback)
        Retrieve subsequent pages of deleted documents in the user's library.

      • postDocument

        void postDocument(Document document,
                PostDocumentCallback callback)
        Add a new document to the user's library.
        Parameters:
        document - the document object to be added.

      • patchDocument

        void patchDocument(java.lang.String documentId,
                 java.util.Date date,
                 Document document,
                 PatchDocumentCallback callback)
        Modify an existing document in the user's library.
        Parameters:
        documentId - the id of the document to be modified.
        date - sets an optional "if unmodified since" condition on the request. Ignored if null.
        document - a document object containing the fields to be updated. Missing fields are left unchanged (not cleared).

      • trashDocument

        void trashDocument(java.lang.String documentId,
                 TrashDocumentCallback callback)
        Move an existing document into the user's trash collection.
        Parameters:
        documentId - id of the document to be trashed.

      • deleteDocument

        void deleteDocument(java.lang.String documentId,
                  DeleteDocumentCallback callback)
        Delete a document.
        Parameters:
        documentId - id of the document to be deleted.

      • getDocumentTypes

        RequestHandle getDocumentTypes(GetDocumentTypesCallback callback)
        Return a list of valid document types.

      • getFiles

        RequestHandle getFiles(FileRequestParameters parameters,
                     GetFilesCallback callback)
        Return metadata for a user's files, subject to specified query parameters.

      • getFiles

        RequestHandle getFiles(GetFilesCallback callback)
        Return metadata for all files associated with all of the user's documents.

      • getFiles

        RequestHandle getFiles(Page next,
                     GetFilesCallback callback)
        Return the next page of file metadata entries.
        Parameters:
        next - returned from previous getFiles() call.

      • getFile

        void getFile(java.lang.String fileId,
           java.lang.String documentId,
           java.lang.String folderPath,
           GetFileCallback callback)
        Download the content of a file.
        Parameters:
        fileId - the id of the file to download.
        folderPath - the local filesystem path in which to save the file.

      • cancelDownload

        void cancelDownload(java.lang.String fileId)
        Cancel an in-progress file download.
        Parameters:
        fileId - the id of the file being downloaded.

      • postFile

        void postFile(java.lang.String contentType,
            java.lang.String documentId,
            java.lang.String filePath,
            PostFileCallback callback)
        Upload a new file.
        Parameters:
        contentType - MIME type of the file, e.g "application/pdf".
        documentId - the ID of the document the file should be attached to.
        filePath - the absolute local filesystem path where the file can be found.

      • postFile

        void postFile(java.lang.String contentType,
            java.lang.String documentId,
            java.io.InputStream inputStream,
            java.lang.String fileName,
            PostFileCallback callback)
        Upload a new file.
        Parameters:
        contentType - MIME type of the file, e.g "application/pdf".
        documentId - the ID of the document the file should be attached to.
        inputStream - stream providing the data to be uploaded.
        fileName - the name to be used for the file.

      • deleteFile

        void deleteFile(java.lang.String fileId,
              DeleteFileCallback callback)
        Delete a file.
        Parameters:
        fileId - the ID of the file to be deleted.

      • getMyProfile

        void getMyProfile(GetProfileCallback callback)
        Return the user's profile information.

      • getProfile

        void getProfile(java.lang.String profileId,
              GetProfileCallback callback)
        Return profile information for another user.
        Parameters:
        profileId - ID of the profile to be fetched.

      • getFolders

        RequestHandle getFolders(FolderRequestParameters parameters,
                       GetFoldersCallback callback)
        Return metadata for all the user's folders.

      • getFolders

        RequestHandle getFolders(GetFoldersCallback callback)
        Return metadata for all the user's folders.

      • getFolders

        RequestHandle getFolders(Page next,
                       GetFoldersCallback callback)
        Returns the next page of folder metadata entries.
        Parameters:
        next - returned from a previous getFolders() call.

      • getFolderDocumentIds

        void getFolderDocumentIds(Page next,
                        java.lang.String groupId,
                        GetGroupMembersCallback callback)
        Returns the next page of members user roles of a group.
        Parameters:
        next - returned by a previous call to getGroupMembers().
        groupId - provides an ID to return in the callback (the value is not actually checked by this call).

      • getFolder

        void getFolder(java.lang.String folderId,
             GetFolderCallback callback)
        Returns metadata for a single folder, specified by ID.
        Parameters:
        folderId - ID of the folder to retrieve metadata for.

      • postFolder

        void postFolder(Folder folder,
              PostFolderCallback callback)
        Create a new folder.
        Parameters:
        folder - metadata for the folder to create.

      • patchFolder

        void patchFolder(java.lang.String folderId,
               Folder folder,
               PatchFolderCallback callback)
        Update a folder's metadata.

        This can be used to rename the folder, and/or to move it to a new parent.

        Parameters:
        folderId - the id of the folder to modify.
        folder - metadata object that provides the new name and parentId.

      • getFolderDocumentIds

        void getFolderDocumentIds(FolderRequestParameters parameters,
                        java.lang.String folderId,
                        GetFolderDocumentIdsCallback callback)
        Return a list of IDs of the documents stored in a particular folder.
        Parameters:
        folderId - ID of the folder to inspect.

      • getFolderDocumentIds

        void getFolderDocumentIds(Page next,
                        java.lang.String folderId,
                        GetFolderDocumentIdsCallback callback)
        Returns the next page of document IDs stored in a particular folder.
        Parameters:
        next - returned by a previous call to getFolderDocumentIds().
        folderId - provides an ID to return in the callback (the value is not actually checked by this call).

      • postDocumentToFolder

        void postDocumentToFolder(java.lang.String folderId,
                        java.lang.String documentId,
                        PostDocumentToFolderCallback callback)
        Add a document to a folder.
        Parameters:
        folderId - the ID the folder.
        documentId - the ID of the document to add to the folder.

      • deleteFolder

        void deleteFolder(java.lang.String folderId,
                DeleteFolderCallback callback)
        Delete a folder.

        This does not delete the documents inside the folder.

        Parameters:
        folderId - the ID of the folder to delete.

      • deleteDocumentFromFolder

        void deleteDocumentFromFolder(java.lang.String folderId,
                            java.lang.String documentId,
                            DeleteFolderDocumentCallback callback)
        Remove a document from a folder.

        This does not delete the documents itself.

        Parameters:
        folderId - the ID of the folder.
        documentId - the ID of the document to remove.

      • getImage

        void getImage(java.lang.String url,
            GetImageCallback callback)
        Download an image.

      • getGroups

        RequestHandle getGroups(GroupRequestParameters parameters,
                      GetGroupsCallback callback)
        Return metadata for all the user's groups.

      • getGroups

        RequestHandle getGroups(Page next,
                      GetGroupsCallback callback)
        Returns the next page of group metadata entries.
        Parameters:
        next - returned from a previous getGroups() call.

      • getGroup

        void getGroup(java.lang.String groupId,
            GetGroupCallback callback)
        Returns metadata for a single group, specified by ID.
        Parameters:
        groupId - ID of the group to retrieve metadata for.

      • getGroupMembers

        void getGroupMembers(GroupRequestParameters parameters,
                   java.lang.String groupId,
                   GetGroupMembersCallback callback)
        Return a list of members user roles of a particular group.
        Parameters:
        groupId - ID of the group to inspect.

      • setExecutor

        MendeleySdk setExecutor(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
        Specify the executor used to run background tasks.
